name: Bunkichi and Mitsuko
description: Requires you to have a leaf from a tree in the yard next to the gym at school. First available on April 25 on Monday-Saturday. They're located at bookworms in Iwatodai Station.
ranks: Rank 2: Tell him > Thanks > Anything x3
Rank 3: Say "Looking for something?" > I'll help you look > Anything x3
Rank 4: Anything x2 > Now, you have me worried
Rank 5: Say "I'll root out the truth!" > Anything
Rank 7: Ask why she's crying > That's great > Anything
unlocks: For completing this social link you are able to fuse Kohryu through Cross fusion using Byakko, Suzaku, Seiryuu and Genbu.
